name: Credentials
title: Google
Cloud
Language
Credentials
description:
Credentials

Represents the authentication and authorization used to connect to the Natural Language API.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language"

keyfile = "/path/to/keyfile.json"
creds = Google::Cloud::Language::Credentials.new keyfile

language = Google::Cloud::Language.new(
  project_id: "my-project",
  credentials: creds
)

language.project_id #=> "my-project"
